amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Health and Human Services; official names of institutions under supervision.
amendatorysection.para: The official names of the state institutions under the supervision of the Department of Health and Human Services shall be as follows: (1) Beatrice State Developmental Center, (2) Lincoln Regional Center, (3) Norfolk Regional Center, (4) Hastings Regional Center, (5) Youth Rehabilitation and Treatment Center-Kearney, and (6) Youth Rehabilitation and Treatment Center-Geneva.

crossreference.para: For provisions relating to the Beatrice State Developmental Center, see sections 83-217 to 83-227.02.
For provisions relating to the state hospitals for the mentally ill, see sections 83-305 to 83-357.
